Type.Name: EventInfo

TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class EventInfo : System.Reflection.MemberInfo, System.Runtime.InteropServices._EventInfo
.class public sequential ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit EventInfo extends System.Reflection.MemberInfo implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._EventInfo

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: This type is safe for multithreaded operations.

remarks.para:
Events are handled by delegates. An event listener supplies an event-handler delegate that is invoked whenever the event is raised by an event source. In order to connect to the event source, the event listener adds this delegate to the invocation list of the source. When the event is raised, the event-handler delegate invokes the methods in its invocation list. The ,
, , and methods, and the delegate type of the event-handler associated with an event, are required to be marked in the metadata.

para.block:
For information on delegates, see the
class overview.
For information on events, see Partitions I and II of the CLI specification.

Docs.param: An object that represents an event source.

param.name: handler
param.para: A instance to be added to that references methods to be invoked when the event reflected by the current instance is raised by .

summary.para: Adds the specified event handler delegate to the specified event source.

remarks.para: Each time the event reflected by the current instance is raised by , the methods in the invocation list of are invoked.

exception.para: is not the same as the event handler delegate declared for the event reflected by the current instance.

Docs.exception: The event reflected by the current instance is non-static, and is or is of a type that does not implement the event reflected by the current instance.

summary.para: Gets the of the event-handler associated with the event reflected by the current instance.

value.para: A that represents the type of the event-handler associated with the event reflected by the current instance. Returns if the method used to add a delegate to the event is not public and is in a loaded assembly, and the caller does not have the required permission.

Docs.permission: Requires permission to reflect non-public members of a type in loaded assemblies. See .

summary.para: Returns the public method used to add an event handler delegate to an event source for the event reflected by the current instance.

returns.para: A instance that reflects the public method used to add an event handler delegate to an event source for the event reflected by the current instance, if found; otherwise, returns .

block.para: The returned method is used to add an event-handler delegate to the invocation list of an event source. Typically, the method has the following signature format:

Docs.param: An object that represents an event source.

param.name: handler
param.para: A instance to be disassociated from the events reflected by the current instance that are raised by .

summary.para: Removes the specified event handler delegate from the specified event source.

remarks.para:
After this method is invoked, subsequent events reflected by the current instance that are raised by will no longer cause to
invoke its methods.

exception.para: is not the same type as the event handler delegate declared for the event reflected by the current instance.
